summary: To initiate a 3-day post-travel nutrition reset focused on hydration and whole foods.
trigger: The need for a post-travel nutrition reset, as stated in the decision message.
rationale: For the next 3 days, Rohan is to focus on hydration (lots of water) and whole foods (lean protein, vegetables).
Rohan should completely avoid processed foods, excess salt, and alcohol.
The stated goal of this nutrition plan is to help flush his system.
